analysis.description: HeroCoin.isContract (/unique_chucks/12/0xa854529f651b26dd7d2dc5c10954ffc48357bb5b.sol#400-412) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in SaleBase.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0xa854529f651b26dd7d2dc5c10954ffc48357bb5b.sol#557-571):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculateTokenAmount(weiAmount,tokensSold) (/unique_chucks/12/0xa854529f651b26dd7d2dc5c10954ffc48357bb5b.sol#564-567)
	- mintTokenToBuyer(beneficiary,tokenAmount,weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/12/0xa854529f651b26dd7d2dc5c10954ffc48357bb5b.sol#567-568)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/12/0xa854529f651b26dd7d2dc5c10954ffc48357bb5b.sol#567-568)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/12/0xa854529f651b26dd7d2dc5c10954ffc48357bb5b.sol#567-568)
empty in HeroCoin.transfer (/unique_chucks/12/0xa854529f651b26dd7d2dc5c10954ffc48357bb5b.sol#249) is a local variable never initialiazed
empty in HeroCoin.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/12/0xa854529f651b26dd7d2dc5c10954ffc48357bb5b.sol#292-293) is a local variable never initialiazed

SaleBase.mintTokenToBuyer (/unique_chucks/12/0xa854529f651b26dd7d2dc5c10954ffc48357bb5b.sol#571-583) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokenAmount,holderGroupNumber()) (/unique_chucks/12/0xa854529f651b26dd7d2dc5c10954ffc48357bb5b.sol#580-581)
